title: Espresso Tales
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "Both the 23 and the 27 go up Dundas Street and on to Tollcross. Then the 23 carries on up to Morningside, whereas the 27 turns right at the King's Theatre and goes along Gilmore Place to Polwarth."

title: Filth
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Then, the Napier University and the rise of twilight and the chirping of birds up towards the gardens at Gilmore Place and then we are at the King's Theatre.
